titleStmt.title: The nevve and admirable arte of setting of corne with all the necessarie tooles and other circumstances belonging to the same: the particular titles whereof, are set downe in the page following.
titleStmt.author: Plat, Hugh, Sir, 1552-1611?

publicationStmt.publisher: By Peter Short, dwelling at the figure of the Starre on Bredstreet hill,

notesStmt.note: "A2r line 1 of text ends: "probablie", line 3 has "new"; C1r line 7 of text ends "cause", line 11 has "wormes"."--STC.
